info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued August 24 at 3:38PM PDT until August 24 at 6:45PM PDT by NWS LasVegas
info.description: The National Weather Service in Las Vegas has issued a * Flash Flood Warning for... Northwestern Clark County in southern Nevada... * Until 645 PM PDT. * At 338 PM PDT, Doppler radar indicated thunderstorms producing heavy rain northeast of Mt. Charleston. Flash flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly. HAZARD...Life-threatening flash flooding. Thunderstorms producing flash flooding. SOURCE...Radar. IMPACT...Life-threatening flash flooding of low-water crossings, creeks, normally dry washes and roads. * Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... mainly rural areas of Northwestern Clark County This includes the following roads... Highway 95 in Clark County between mile marker 99 and mile marker 108. Lee Canyon Road between mile marker 7 and mile marker 17. FLASH FLOOD...RADAR INDICATED FLASH FLOOD DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
